gradle/org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins/JacocoReportAggregationPlugin

JacocoReportAggregationPlugin

@Incubating
abstract class JacocoReportAggregationPlugin : Plugin<T> (source)

Adds configurations to for resolving variants containing JaCoCo code coverage results, which may span multiple subprojects. Reacts to the presence of the jvm-test-suite plugin and creates tasks to collect code coverage results for each named test-suite.

Since

7.4

See also

<a href="https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/jacoco_report_aggregation_plugin.html">JaCoCo Report Aggregation Plugin reference</a>
